list_definition.mean_english: sự hợp nhất, sự kết hợp
list_definition.definition: the act of uniting or process of being united

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Union between the two countries would be impossible.

list_definition.definition: the state of being united, eg in marriage, friendship etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Their marriage was a perfect union.
